seo.title: Kling 2.6 Pro – AI Text & Image to Video with Native Audio | MaxVideoAI
seo.description: Generate cinematic AI videos with Kling 2.6 Pro inside MaxVideoAI. Turn text or images into short clips with native dialogue, ambience and sound effects—ideal for emotional storytelling, product ads, social videos and VFX previz.

overview: Kling 2.6 Pro in MaxVideoAI: short-form cinematic clips with native audio, text or image input, 1080p output, 5–10s runs, and audio on/off toggle.

hero.title: Kling 2.6 Pro – Cinematic AI Video with Native Audio
hero.intro: Emotionally rich, cinematic AI video with realistic dialogue and sound for ads, VFX and storytelling.

bestUseCases.title: Best use cases
items: Product ads with dialogue and ambience baked in
Emotional storytelling in short, cinematic beats
Social-first clips needing polished motion and sound
Previsualization for VFX and motion design

technicalOverview.label: Inputs
technicalOverview.body: Text → Video; Image → Video (PNG/JPG/WebP), prompt + negative + seed

technicalOverview.label: Audio
technicalOverview.body: Native audio on by default; toggle off for silent runs

technicalOverview.label: Pricing
technicalOverview.body: Per-second; example: $0.14/s audio on, $0.07/s audio off

promptStructure.title: Prompting Kling 2.6 Pro
promptStructure.quote: Cinematic [subject] in [setting], [camera move], [lighting/grade], [duration 5–10s], aspect [16:9/9:16/1:1], audio with [dialogue/ambience/SFX].
promptStructure.description: Write concise, shot-level prompts: subject, motion, style, duration and audio.

tips.title: Tips & limits
items: Keep clips to 5–10s and one clear action.
Use 9:16 for social verticals; 16:9 for widescreen.
Keep dialogue short; refine with negative prompts to avoid extra subjects.
Audio on by default—toggle off when scoring separately.

prompts.title: Cinematic dialogue alley
prompts.prompt: Two friends walk through a rain-soaked neon alley at night, camera tracks at shoulder height, reflective puddles, soft thunder, quiet dialogue: “Did you get the shot?” “Yeah, Kling 2.6 nailed it.”

prompts.title: Product hero vertical
prompts.prompt: Vertical close-up of a smartwatch rotating over a soft neon gradient background, camera dolly with gentle parallax, crisp reflections, 1080p, subtle electronic ambience and SFX.

faqs.a: Yes, native audio is on by default. You can toggle it off for silent exports.
Text → Video and Image → Video in a single card. No first/last frame in this routing.
Stay within 5–10s for strong beats. Stitch multiple renders for longer narratives.

custom.heroDesc1: Cinematic 5–10s clips where video, dialogue, ambience, sound effects, and music are generated together in one pass at 1080p. Text or image input in a single card, with native audio in English and Chinese built in.
custom.heroDesc2: Use Kling 2.6 Pro when you need emotionally rich motion with fully synced sound; toggle audio off for silent drafts or manual sound design.
heroHighlights: Text → Video and Image → Video in one card
End-to-end audio: dialogue/narration, SFX, ambience, music in one pass
5–10s cinematic clips at 1080p with strong prompt adherence
Audio toggle for previs or sound-on renders
Native speech in English and Chinese
Per-second pricing through your MaxVideoAI wallet
custom.specTitle: Real Specs – Kling 2.6 Pro in MaxVideoAI
custom.specNote: Specs reflect the live Fal routing today.

specSections.title: Duration & Output
items: Durations: 5 or 10 seconds
Resolution: 1080p

specSections.title: Aspect Ratios
items: 16:9 — cinematic landscape
9:16 — vertical for social
1:1 — square feed placements

specSections.title: Inputs
items: Text prompts with concise scene direction
Image → Video: single still (PNG/JPG/WebP)

specSections.title: Audio
items: Native audio on by default – dialogue/narration, SFX, ambience and a music bed generated together with the visuals
Toggle audio off when adding your own mix or for silent previs renders
Languages: English and Chinese speech supported in this routing

specSections.title: Pricing
items: ~$0.07/s audio off; ~$0.14/s audio on
Wallet-based pay-as-you-go

custom.whatTitle: How Kling 2.6 Pro works in MaxVideoAI
custom.whatIntro1: Pick text or image mode, set 5 or 10 seconds at 1080p, choose aspect (16:9/9:16/1:1), toggle audio, and prompt.
custom.whatIntro2: Use Kling 2.6 Pro when you need dialogue-ready clips with strong motion and synced ambience.
whatFlowSteps: Select Kling 2.6 Pro (Text → Video or Image → Video)
Audio on/off, add prompt and optional negative/seed
Upload one reference still for I2V when needed
See live price chip, then generate
custom.galleryIntro: Recent Kling 2.6 Pro renders with native audio for dialogue, ambience, and emotional storytelling.
custom.promptIntro: Stay concise but write for both picture and sound: subject, action, camera, lighting, 5–10s, aspect, then a clear audio note.
promptPatternSteps: Subject & action (1–2 beats you can see and hear)
Audio note: short dialogue line + ambience/SFX/music, or “mute”
custom.promptSkeleton: Cinematic [subject] in [setting], [camera move], [lighting/grade], [duration 5–10s], [aspect], audio [on/off] with [short dialogue line + ambience/SFX/music].
custom.promptSkeletonNote: Keep dialogue short and clear; negatives help avoid extra subjects.
strengths: Native audio for dialogue, ambience, SFX and a light music bed
Best results between 5–10s with 1–2 clear actions; chain clips for longer arcs
1080p-only in this routing; use Kling 2.5, Wan or Veo for 4K
boundaries: English and Chinese speech only; disable audio and dub in post for other languages
One reference still for I2V; no multi-image or per-character voice control yet
